ORSHIN Attack Defense Framework

Fuse modification

Description

Fuse modification

CWE

CVE

Attack Surfaces

Private Key (MITRE EMB3D PID-12)

Memory (MITRE EMB3D PID-12)

Attack Vectors

FIB (MITRE EMB3D TID-105)

Defenses

Programmed fuses should not be modifiable by the attacker, Prefer using oxide breakdown fuse technology.
